item.title: CVE-2018-1130|2024-08-05T03:51:48.970Z -- unspecified -- kernel
item.description: Linux kernel before version 4.16-rc7 is vulnerable to a null pointer dereference in dccp_write_xmit() function in net/dccp/output.c in that allows a local user to cause a denial of service by a number of certain crafted system calls.
